meanings.sent1: The dietitian helped me create a healthy meal plan.
meanings.sent2: I scheduled an appointment with the dietitian to discuss my nutrition goals.
meanings.sent3: The dietitian joked that broccoli was the real superhero of vegetables.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was like a compass guiding me towards better eating habits, just like a dietitian.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the dietitian's tips for a balanced diet.

meanings.definition: A professional who advises on matters of food and nutrition.
meanings.sent1: My friend consulted a dietitian to improve her eating habits.
meanings.sent2: The dietitian recommended adding more fruits and vegetables to my diet.
meanings.sent3: The dietitian playfully compared carbs to the villains in a nutrition-themed story.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge was a treasure trove of information, much like that of a dietitian.
meanings.sent5: I felt empowered after meeting with the dietitian to discuss my nutrition plan.
